Class for utility functions.

      Deserializes the specified JSON string to the specified class and returns the parsed object.
      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:
      clazz - class of deserialized type
      json - string to be parsed
      Returns:

    • getImages

      public static Image[] getImages(String pathPrefix)
      Reads and returns an array of images (png type), are found at the specified path. Their name has to be sequential numbers from 0.
      Parameters:
      pathPrefix - where search for png-s
      Returns:
      array of found images

    • getImages

      public static Image[] getImages(String pathPrefix, String[] fNames)
      Reads and returns an array of images (png type), are found at the specified path and have the specified names (without file extensions).
      Parameters:
      pathPrefix - where search for png-s
      fNames - name of png-s
      Returns:
      array of images

    • copy

      public static int[][] copy(int[][] array)
      Makes a deep copy of the specified 2D integer array, uses System.arraycopy(Object, int, Object, int, int).
      Parameters:
      array - to be cloned
      Returns:
      a deep copy

    • set

      public static void set(int[][] src, int[][] dst)
      Copies the values of the first array to the second array.
      Parameters:
      src - to be cloned
      dst - stored to

    • shuffle

      public static void shuffle(int[] array, int from, int to, Random random)
      Shuffles in place the specified array between the specified positions.
      Parameters:
      array - to be shuffled
      from - shuffle from
      to - shuffle to
      random - random number generator

    • copyShuffle

      public static int[] copyShuffle(int[] array, int from, int to, Random random)
      Copies the and after shuffles the specified array between the specified positions.
      Parameters:
      array - to be copied and shuffled
      from - shuffle from
      to - shuffle to
      random - random number generator
      Returns:
      copied and shuffled array
